article_node.title: Festivals in the West this bank holiday weekend
article_node.summary: The August bank holiday weekend in the West features a variety of festivals and events, including the Forwards Festival in Bristol, which will showcase international artists and focus on discussions about current issues. Other highlights include the BBC Proms, Old City Sounds, and the Stone Carving Festival at Gloucester Cathedral, all offering diverse cultural experiences. Additionally, community events like Football in the River and UkraineFest aim to engage locals and celebrate heritage and solidarity.
